resources.string: There are no valid update packages.
Server error: Please update server source code.
Your system is currently up to date.
A system update found on server
Firmware update can enhance machine stability and patch bugs.
Would you like to install the system update now?
You will not be able to use your tablet or make emergency calls during the installation. Please do not remove the battery and your SD card or turn off the tablet.
You will not be able to use your phone or make emergency calls during the installation. Please do not remove the battery and your SD card or turn off the phone.
The latest system updates package was found in your SD-card, would you like to install?

You will not be able to use your tablet or make emergency calls during the installation. Please do not remove the battery and your SD card or turn off the tablet. \nBefore starting installation, please ensure that the package is downloaded from the official website and is not corrupted.

You will not be able to use your phone or make emergency calls during the installation. Please do not remove the battery and your SD card or turn off the phone. \nBefore starting installation, please ensure that the package is downloaded from the official website and is not corrupted.
Would you like to download the system optimization update?
We would recommended using a free Wi-Fi hotspot or an unlimited data plan to apply this update. If not standard data connection charges may apply. \nPlease back up your data first before upgrading.
Downloading via mobile networks may cause additional charges. Would you like to continue?
Tap to install the system update
SD card error. Please check your SD card and try again.
SD card mount error, please check it.
The installation need at least %s bytes storage. Please release space to continue.
Please ensure that the package is downloaded from the official website and the package is not corrupted. Otherwise it may cause system problems.
An unknown error occurs. Please leave this page and try again.
No enough space on the SD card.
System updates stopped, due to the upgrade is invalid.
This operation will discard the downloaded file.
The current APN does not support the downloading, would you like to change to another APN or turn on Wi-Fi?
Package error. Please check update and download again.
No enough space on the device.
No enough space on the phone.
Need full package for partition changed case.
Congratulations! Your device has been updated successfully to version %s.
Congratulations! Your phone has been updated successfully to version %s.
Copy the package to phone storage is required to continue the upgrade.\nNo enough space on your phone.
System updates stopped, due to SD card is unmounted.
Do you want to scan your SD card to find out more update packages?

System supports firmware upgrade only from official website or server. If user uses 3rd party ROM image and/or any other root method to upgrade firmware, it will cause phone unstable. Please be noted user should take all responsibility for all these behaviors.
